replies.body:
Reason I did not even watch it. I am impressed Koo managed to even win one game.

Edit : Nvm that, I watched that total "misplay" from SKT getting aced in game 3 at level 3. It was intentionnal, there is NO way they played suddenly this bad all of a sudden. Most flashs were even saved there.

We can now finally close the ugly book that was season 5 competitive and never open it again.
I kind of have a feeling they let them win, since SKT wrekt their shit in the game right after..
Why would they let them win? SKT could've been the first team ever to have a winning streak all the way to the cup.
yeah, those times they went ham in early game was fun to watch but it was so stupid in both games (2 and 3)... they threw game 3... game 4 was we cant deal with ryze so...  Ryze wins
Apparently Riot isn't going to make skins for teams that have won before. Even though easyhoon deserves one <3 This ofcourse is hear-say so it may or may not be true.
After losing a game Faker turned up his effort meter from 20% to 30% and rekt KOO's 110% like it was no big deal.
Faker is Frieza confirmed.
15/0/0 THIS ISN'T EVEN MY FINAL FORM
Cuz like we said in my other thread, they threw that game and he was pissed the Riot overlords made him lol
Yay... the worlds of minimal strategy maximum mechanical outplay is over.
What? This was more strategic than any other worlds, and less mechanic based too. Only SSW was as strategic.

> [{quoted}](name=ihaveapotion,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-31T19:00:57.054+0000)
spoiler

*SKT has perfect score in groups stage*
*SKT has perfect score in knockout stage up until the finals*
http://i.imgur.com/GJYqevR.jpg
doesnt matter, some people you know, like going in with a blank slate to watch the game...
but it was completely obvious who was going to win lol.

like honestly the esports tab on the lol site actually says, in a gigantic bold banner, SKT WINS 3/1!!!!!!111!!!!!!!!!!
it's impossible to not get spoiled.

> [{quoted}](name=ihaveapotion,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-31T19:00:57.054+0000)
>
> thanks for the spoiler you stupid prick

whenever i want to watch a competitive league game i usually watch them first before i even dare go on the forums
Spoilers aside, I'm more bummed out we wont get skins for the winning team this year. Riot has stated they wont give a team that wins worlds more than once another team skin after the initial win.

Can you give me a source please? 
Wanna be sure about it.
I've just seen it float around a bunch of times as of late, and other people have provided links... I personally can't seem to find it. Knowing Riot it's somewhere in the hells known as "Reddit".

> [{quoted}](name=Hatless Casual,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T07:47:13.802+0000)
>
> I've just seen it float around a bunch of times as of late, and other people have provided links... I personally can't seem to find it. Knowing Riot it's somewhere in the hells known as "Reddit".

There's literally no way they aren't making skins.

You have been trolled.
Man Faker makes Ryze look like the most broken champion in game...
Thanks for the spoilers.
was it really a spoiler? I mean come on
Yes, while i was guessing SKT would have won i would have liked to have enjoyed it after work rather than knowing the outcome before the VODs were even ready.
why read the forums then? welcome to the internet...

i check the forums often to read the debates about new story/art, fotm complaints, general discussion about pbe updates. it's a good place for some light reading so it is sorta a bummer when stuff like this gets posted

Be honest! 
Isn't it kinda obvious that you find spoiler here?
Same with facebook... better dont look for something here or on fb.
You WILL get spoilerd.
Same counts for series like The Walkind Dead.
Never ever go to social media if you dont want to see a spoiler.

spoilers? lol Isn't it like "why did you tell me 1+1 is 2?? I'm still working on it!"

pretty obvious SKT will win :/ no surprises at all

Honestly I'm just tired of asians winning every year
... This is an american made game... ddos them ffs
downvoted for racism

Get good instead of cheating. 

Nice American spirit you got there.

You're a disgrace.
spoilers dude
Someone knows what are the skins that they choose this time? I want a SKT1 Ryze
The players choose. They changed that S4 onward.

> [{quoted}](name=Venowolf,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-31T19:07:05.954+0000)
>
> Someone knows what are the skins that they choose this time? I want a SKT1 Ryze

Yes someone pls answer.  I have seen it be the last 5 man comp used to win worlds and the best of each lane for that given team.  Please let it not just be the last champs used.  Do we really need another Sivir skin?????

Why did the other team need to pick ashe/lulu/kench {{item:3070}}
Ryze skin is a surprise! Thx Faker ^_^

It'll probably be Ahri to be honest.
Faker wanted an Ahri skin last time he won, but Riot decided what champions got skins then. Now they let the players choose.

Nobody else had moves like Faker!
https://youtu.be/c9meAnFikBk
SKT skins again lol ew
EUW is still the most skilled region in the world.
Why haven't they won since season 1 then?
To let the other regions get some shine too.
Well they should stop, wish the championship could be won by a non Korean team once in a while..

> [{quoted}](name=Lajneen,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-31T15:54:27.680+0000)
>
> EUW is still the most skilled region in the world.

At choking and they have 2 Koreans anyway

> [{quoted}](name=Lajneen,realm=EUW,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=rxI2Eipa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-31T15:54:27.680+0000)
>
> EUW is still the most skilled region in the world.

Dank memes bruh >.<
